description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的省份，简称“琼”，是中华人民共和国唯一全境位于热带的省份，也是总面积和海洋面积最大的省份。1988年由广东省海南行政区析出设立。
description.en: A province of the People's Republic of China, abbreviated as 'Qiong'. It is the only province in the PRC located entirely in the tropics and the largest by total and maritime area. It was established in 1988, separated from the Hainan Administrative Region of Guangdong Province.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，现任中国共产党海南省委员会书记、海南省人民代表大会常务委员会主任。
description.en: A politician of the People's Republic of China, currently serving as Secretary of the Hainan Provincial Committee of the Communist Party of China and Chairman of the Standing Committee of the Hainan Provincial People's Congress.

nodes.id: 中国共产党海南省委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党海南省委员会
en: Hainan Provincial Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在海南省的领导机关。
description.en: The leading organ of the Communist Party of China in Hainan Province.

nodes.id: 海南省人民代表大会常务委员会

zh-cn: 海南省人民代表大会常务委员会
en: Standing Committee of the Hainan Provincial People's Congress

description.zh-cn: 海南省人民代表大会的常设机关。
description.en: The standing body of the Hainan Provincial People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，现任海南省人民政府省长。
description.en: A politician of the People's Republic of China, currently serving as the Governor of Hainan Province.

description.zh-cn: 海南省的最高国家行政机关。
description.en: The highest state administrative organ of Hainan Province.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，现任中国人民政治协商会议海南省委员会主席。
description.en: A politician of the People's Republic of China, currently serving as the Chairman of the Hainan Provincial Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference.

nodes.id: 中国人民政治协商会议海南省委员会

zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议海南省委员会
en: Hainan Provincial Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference

description.zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议在海南省的地方组织。
description.en: The local organization of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference in Hainan Province.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，现任海南省监察委员会主任。
description.en: A politician of the People's Republic of China, currently serving as the Director of the Hainan Provincial Supervisory Commission.

description.zh-cn: 海南省的国家监察机关。
description.en: The state supervisory organ of Hainan Province.

nodes.id: 第七届全国人民代表大会第一次会议

zh-cn: 第七届全国人民代表大会第一次会议
en: First Session of the 7th National People's Congress

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国广东省曾经设立的行政区，管辖范围为海南岛及南海诸岛。1988年撤销并设立海南省。
description.en: A former administrative region of Guangdong Province, PRC, governing Hainan Island and the South China Sea Islands. It was abolished in 1988 to establish Hainan Province.

description.zh-cn: 1988年设立的中国经济特区，也是面积最大的经济特区。
description.en: A special economic zone of China established in 1988, and the largest in terms of area.

nodes.id: 中国共产党中央委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会
en: Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党的中央权力机关。
description.en: The central authority of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 2018年由中共中央决定支持建设的中国特色自由贸易港。
description.en: A free trade port with Chinese characteristics, the construction of which was supported by a decision from the CPC Central Committee in 2018.

description.zh-cn: 西汉第七位皇帝。
description.en: The seventh emperor of the Western Han dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 中国古代在海南岛设立的行政区划。
description.en: An ancient administrative division established on Hainan Island in China.

description.zh-cn: 中国古代在海南岛设立的行政区划。
description.en: An ancient administrative division established on Hainan Island in China.

description.zh-cn: 西汉第八位皇帝。
description.en: The eighth emperor of the Western Han dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 中国国民党元老和早期主要领导人之一。
description.en: One of the early and principal leaders of the Kuomintang (KMT).

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治家，孙中山之子。
description.en: A politician of the Republic of China, son of Sun Yat-sen.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国国民政府时期设立的特别行政区，旨在为海南建省做准备。
description.en: A special administrative region established during the Nationalist government of the Republic of China, intended to prepare for the establishment of Hainan as a province.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国训政时期的中央政府与最高行政机关。
description.en: The central government and highest administrative body of the Republic of China during the Tutelage Period.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国外交家、书法家。
description.en: A diplomat and calligrapher of the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国军事将领，曾长期主政广东，有“南天王”之称。
description.en: A military general of the Republic of China who governed Guangdong for a long time, known as the 'King of Southern Sky'.

description.zh-cn: 东亚国家，在二战期间占领了海南岛。
description.en: An East Asian country that occupied Hainan Island during World War II.

description.zh-cn: 第二次世界大战期间日本占领海南岛的时期。
description.en: The period of Japanese occupation of Hainan Island during World War II.

description.zh-cn: 缅甸独立运动领袖，曾在海南岛接受军事训练。
description.en: Leader of the Burmese independence movement who received military training on Hainan Island.

description.zh-cn: 海南省的主体岛屿。
description.en: The main island of Hainan Province.

description.zh-cn: 第二次国共内战末期，中国人民解放军为占领海南岛而发动的战役。
description.en: A military campaign launched by the People's Liberation Army to capture Hainan Island at the end of the Chinese Civil War.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The ruling political party of the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国国务院

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院
en: State Council of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的最高国家行政机关。
description.en: The chief administrative authority of the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 西沙群岛、南沙群岛、中沙群岛办事处

zh-cn: 西沙群岛、南沙群岛、中沙群岛办事处

description.zh-cn: 曾负责行使西沙群岛、南沙群岛和中沙群岛及其周边海域主权与管辖权的机构，后被撤销并在此基础上设立三沙市。
description.en: An agency once responsible for exercising sovereignty and jurisdiction over the Xisha, Nansha, and Zhongsha Islands and their surrounding waters, which was later abolished and replaced by the establishment of Sansha City.

description.zh-cn: 海南省下辖的地级市，管辖西沙群岛、中沙群岛、南沙群岛的岛礁及其海域。
description.en: A prefecture-level city under Hainan Province, administering the islands, reefs, and waters of the Xisha, Zhongsha, and Nansha Islands.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会总书记、中华人民共和国主席、中央军事委员会主席。
description.en: General Secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China, President of the People's Republic of China, and Chairman of the Central Military Commission.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，首任中共海南省委书记。
description.en: A politician of the People's Republic of China, the first Secretary of the Hainan Provincial Committee of the CPC.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，曾任中共海南省委书记。
description.en: A politician of the People's Republic of China, formerly served as Secretary of the Hainan Provincial Committee of the CPC.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，曾任中共海南省委书记、海南省省长。
description.en: A politician of the People's Republic of China, formerly served as Secretary of the Hainan Provincial Committee of the CPC and Governor of Hainan Province.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，曾任中共海南省委书记、海南省人大常委会主任。
description.en: A politician of the People's Republic of China, formerly served as Secretary of the Hainan Provincial Committee of the CPC and Chairman of the Standing Committee of the Hainan Provincial People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，曾任中共海南省委书记、海南省人大常委会主任。
description.en: A politician of the People's Republic of China, formerly served as Secretary of the Hainan Provincial Committee of the CPC and Chairman of the Standing Committee of the Hainan Provincial People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，曾任中共海南省委书记、海南省人大常委会主任，后任中华人民共和国副主席。
description.en: A politician of the People's Republic of China, formerly served as Secretary of the Hainan Provincial Committee of the CPC and Chairman of the Standing Committee of the Hainan Provincial People's Congress, and later as Vice President of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，曾任中共海南省委书记、海南省省长、海南省人大常委会主任。
description.en: A politician of the People's Republic of China, formerly served as Secretary of the Hainan Provincial Committee of the CPC, Governor of Hainan Province, and Chairman of the Standing Committee of the Hainan Provincial People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，曾任中共海南省委书记、海南省省长、海南省人大常委会主任。
description.en: A politician of the People's Republic of China, formerly served as Secretary of the Hainan Provincial Committee of the CPC, Governor of Hainan Province, and Chairman of the Standing Committee of the Hainan Provincial People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，曾任中共海南省委书记、海南省省长、海南省人大常委会主任。
description.en: A politician of the People's Republic of China, formerly served as Secretary of the Hainan Provincial Committee of the CPC, Governor of Hainan Province, and Chairman of the Standing Committee of the Hainan Provincial People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，曾任中共海南省委书记、海南省省长、海南省人大常委会主任。
description.en: A politician of the People's Republic of China, formerly served as Secretary of the Hainan Provincial Committee of the CPC, Governor of Hainan Province, and Chairman of the Standing Committee of the Hainan Provincial People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，曾任中共海南省委书记、海南省省长、海南省人大常委会主任。
description.en: A politician of the People's Republic of China, formerly served as Secretary of the Hainan Provincial Committee of the CPC, Governor of Hainan Province, and Chairman of the Standing Committee of the Hainan Provincial People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，首任海南省省长。
description.en: A politician of the People's Republic of China, the first Governor of Hainan Province.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，曾任海南省省长。
description.en: A politician of the People's Republic of China, formerly served as Governor of Hainan Province.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，曾任海南省省长。
description.en: A politician of the People's Republic of China, formerly served as Governor of Hainan Province.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，首任海南省政协主席。
description.en: A politician of the People's Republic of China, the first Chairman of the Hainan Provincial CPPCC.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，曾任海南省政协主席。
description.en: A politician of the People's Republic of China, formerly served as Chairman of the Hainan Provincial CPPCC.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，曾任海南省政协主席。
description.en: A politician of the People's Republic of China, formerly served as Chairman of the Hainan Provincial CPPCC.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，曾任海南省政协主席。
description.en: A politician of the People's Republic of China, formerly served as Chairman of the Hainan Provincial CPPCC.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，曾任海南省政协主席。
description.en: A politician of the People's Republic of China, formerly served as Chairman of the Hainan Provincial CPPCC.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，曾任海南省政协主席。
description.en: A politician of the People's Republic of China, formerly served as Chairman of the Hainan Provincial CPPCC.

relationships.source: 第七届全国人民代表大会第一次会议
relationships.target: 海南省

description.zh-cn: 第七届全国人民代表大会第一次会议通过《关于设立海南省的决定》，正式批准设立海南省。
description.en: The First Session of the 7th National People's Congress passed the 'Decision on the Establishment of Hainan Province', officially approving its establishment.

relationships.source: 第七届全国人民代表大会第一次会议
relationships.target: 海南行政区

description.zh-cn: 第七届全国人民代表大会第一次会议通过决议，撤销广东省海南行政区，以其行政区域设立海南省。
description.en: The First Session of the 7th National People's Congress passed a resolution to abolish the Hainan Administrative Region of Guangdong Province and establish Hainan Province in its administrative area.

relationships.source: 第七届全国人民代表大会第一次会议
relationships.target: 海南经济特区

description.zh-cn: 第七届全国人民代表大会第一次会议通过《关于建立海南经济特区的决议》，批准海南建省办经济特区。
description.en: The First Session of the 7th National People's Congress passed the 'Resolution on the Establishment of the Hainan Special Economic Zone', approving the establishment of Hainan as a province and a special economic zone.

relationships.source: 中国共产党中央委员会
relationships.target: 海南自由贸易港

description.zh-cn: 2018年，中共中央决定支持海南全岛建设自由贸易试验区，逐步探索、稳步推进中国特色自由贸易港建设。
description.en: In 2018, the CPC Central Committee decided to support the construction of a pilot free trade zone on the entire island of Hainan, and to gradually explore and steadily promote the construction of a free trade port with Chinese characteristics.

relationships.target: 海南自由贸易港

description.zh-cn: 在庆祝海南建省办经济特区30周年大会上，中共中央总书记习近平宣布，中共中央决定支持海南逐步探索、稳步推进中国特色自由贸易港建设。
description.en: At the conference celebrating the 30th anniversary of Hainan's establishment as a province and special economic zone, CPC General Secretary Xi Jinping announced that the CPC Central Committee had decided to support Hainan in gradually exploring and steadily advancing the construction of a free trade port with Chinese characteristics.

relationships.target: 珠崖郡

description.zh-cn: 公元前110年，汉武帝在海南岛设置珠崖郡。
description.en: In 110 BC, Emperor Wu of Han established Zhuyai Commandery on Hainan Island.

relationships.target: 儋耳郡

description.zh-cn: 公元前110年，汉武帝在海南岛设置儋耳郡。
description.en: In 110 BC, Emperor Wu of Han established Dan'er Commandery on Hainan Island.

relationships.target: 儋耳郡

description.zh-cn: 公元前82年，汉昭帝将儋耳郡并入珠崖郡。
description.en: In 82 BC, Emperor Zhao of Han merged Dan'er Commandery into Zhuyai Commandery.

relationships.target: 珠崖郡

description.zh-cn: 西汉末年，朝廷罢弃了珠崖郡。
description.en: At the end of the Western Han dynasty, the imperial court abolished Zhuyai Commandery.

relationships.target: 海南特别行政区

description.zh-cn: 胡汉民曾提议设立琼崖特别区（即后来的海南特别行政区）。
description.en: Hu Hanmin proposed the establishment of the Qiongyai Special District (later the Hainan Special Administrative Region).

relationships.target: 海南特别行政区

description.zh-cn: 孙科曾提议设立琼崖特别区（即后来的海南特别行政区）。
description.en: Sun Fo proposed the establishment of the Qiongyai Special District (later the Hainan Special Administrative Region).

relationships.target: 海南特别行政区

description.zh-cn: 1931年12月7日，国民政府国务会议决议划广东省琼崖全属为特别行政区。
description.en: On December 7, 1931, the State Council of the Nationalist Government resolved to designate the entire Qiongyai area of Guangdong Province as a special administrative region.

relationships.target: 海南特别行政区

description.zh-cn: 1931年12月国民政府任命伍朝枢为琼崖特别区行政长官，他于1932年3月1日就任。
description.en: In December 1931, the Nationalist Government appointed Wu Chaoshu as the Administrative Chief of the Qiongyai Special District, and he took office on March 1, 1932.

relationships.target: 海南特别行政区

description.zh-cn: 因陈济棠的暗中阻挠，海南特别行政区的改建事宜未能实施。
description.en: Due to Chen Jitang's covert obstruction, the reorganization of the Hainan Special Administrative Region could not be implemented.

relationships.target: 海南日占时期

description.zh-cn: 1939年，日军占领海南岛，海南岛进入日占时期。
description.en: In 1939, the Japanese army occupied Hainan Island, marking the beginning of the Japanese occupation period.

relationships.target: 海南岛

description.zh-cn: 日占时期，致力于缅甸独立的志士昂山等人在海南岛上进行了军事训练。
description.en: During the Japanese occupation, patriots dedicated to Burmese independence, such as Aung San, conducted military training on Hainan Island.

relationships.target: 海南岛战役

description.zh-cn: 1950年3月至5月间，中国共产党领导的中国人民解放军发动海南岛战役，旨在夺取海南岛的控制权。
description.en: From March to May 1950, the Chinese People's Liberation Army, led by the Communist Party of China, launched the Landing Operation on Hainan Island to seize control of the island.

relationships.source: 中华人民共和国国务院
relationships.target: 西沙群岛、南沙群岛、中沙群岛办事处

description.zh-cn: 1959年3月24日，中华人民共和国国务院设立了西沙群岛、南沙群岛、中沙群岛办事处。
description.en: On March 24, 1959, the State Council of the People's Republic of China established the Office for the Xisha, Nansha, and Zhongsha Islands.

relationships.source: 中华人民共和国国务院
relationships.target: 西沙群岛、南沙群岛、中沙群岛办事处

description.zh-cn: 2012年6月21日，国务院撤销西沙群岛、南沙群岛、中沙群岛办事处，并在其基础上设立地级三沙市。
description.en: On June 21, 2012, the State Council abolished the Office for the Xisha, Nansha, and Zhongsha Islands and established the prefecture-level city of Sansha on its basis.

relationships.source: 中华人民共和国国务院
relationships.target: 三沙市

description.zh-cn: 2012年6月21日，国务院批准设立地级三沙市。
description.en: On June 21, 2012, the State Council approved the establishment of the prefecture-level city of Sansha.
